channel.title: CVE Feed for TeamViewer -- Meeting
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TeamViewer -- Meeting

item.title: CVE-2024-6053|2024-08-28T17:47:14.592Z -- teamviewer -- meeting
item.description: Improper access control in the clipboard synchronization feature in TeamViewer Full Client prior version 15.57 and TeamViewer Meeting prior version 15.55.3 can lead to unintentional sharing of the clipboard with the current presenter of a meeting.

item.title: CVE-2024-6053|2024-08-28T16:30:58.925Z -- teamviewer -- meeting
item.description: Improper access control in the clipboard synchronization feature in TeamViewer Full Client prior version 15.57 and TeamViewer Meeting prior version 15.55.3 can lead to unintentional sharing of the clipboard with the current presenter of a meeting.
